title: Furious Watchface Pro
summary: Let your watch shout out loud her love for you !
description: Why should I describe this Watchface ? You want it, you need it and you know it. It's that simple.Every XXmin, a new kind and lovely message is displayed with the current time.You can customize the colors of the background and the text with the parameters in Android WearWhy should you use the pro version ?- More insults (50 more than on the free version)- You can choose the refresh time of the insult- You can pick the language of the time and of the insult- I will love you more because thank's to you I may be able to eat at the end of the month <3Peace.If you have any suggestion or if you find any bug, feel free to contact me using the forum https://groups.google.com/forum/?hl=fr#!forum/furious-watchfaceThank you.
descriptionHTML:
Why should I describe this Watchface ?
You want it, you need it and you know it. It's that simple.

Every XXmin, a new kind and lovely message is displayed with the current time.

You can customize the colors of the background and the text with the parameters in Android Wear


Why should you use the pro version ?
- More insults (50 more than on the free version)
- You can choose the refresh time of the insult
- You can pick the language of the time and of the insult
- I will love you more because thank's to you I may be able to eat at the end of the month <3

Peace.


If you have any suggestion or if you find any bug, feel free to contact me using the forum
https://groups.google.com/forum/?hl=fr#!forum/furious-watchface
Thank you.
comments: Pro unlock didn't do anything for me either.

Not happy...yet I paid the Pro fee, installed app, but didn't see app transfer to my Gear or watchface category. Please help. Even uninstalled app and tried again. Nothing negative about your app, just need a little bit assistance. Will support anyone with a clever idea such as this...thanks for any help.
Brother. Eat well by the end of the month. You forced my hand here to pay. It's so freaking cool. Thank you.
Great You want it, you just do....

Love it but wish there were more features. If you could add the ability to add/remove/edit the custom insults, that would be sooooo nice. That being said, this is still wonderful and I'd pay more if I could.

OK, after loading the free version, I had to spring for the Pro version. I still love the concept: a watch face with attitude.   I'd give it five stars if there were a way to tone down the language a bit. I have to be careful who I show this to!
recentChanges: Life is short, so is this changelog.
- The Watchface now consumes less battery than before
- "Numeric" mode : if you're not able to read properly the text displaying the hour, maybe it'll be easier for you to understand some numbers
- Switch to a 12 or 24h format for the numeric mode
